Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Demonstrably \De*mon"stra*bly\, adv. In a demonstrable manner; incontrovertibly; clearly. [1913 Webster]
Cases that demonstrably concerned the public cause. --Clarendon. [1913 Webster]
demonstrably adv : in an obvious and provable manner; "his documentary sources are demonstrably wrong" [syn: {provably}, {incontrovertibly}]
